mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as value FROM SYS_FUNCTION
SELECT count(1) as value FROM SYS_FUNCTION WHERE FUNCTION_ID=#{functionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select distinct f.function_id, f.function_name, f.url, f.priority from sys_function f, sys_function_crud fc, sys_rel_role_func r where f.function_id = fc.function_id and fc.rel_id = r.rel_id and r.role_id = #{role_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by f.priority desc

select distinct f.function_id, f.function_name, f.url, f.priority from sys_function f, sys_function_crud fc, sys_rel_role_func r where f.function_id = fc.function_id and fc.rel_id = r.rel_id and r.role_id in (#{role_ids}) and f.category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by f.priority desc

SELECT count(1) as value from(select distinct f.function_id, f.function_name, f.url, f.priority from sys_function f, sys_function_crud fc, sys_rel_role_func r where f.function_id = fc.function_id and fc.rel_id = r.rel_id and r.role_id = #{role_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and f.category_id = #{category_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by f.priority desc) as subsql
